website_summaries.verdict: Combines classic Play-Doh with contemporary characters to make one fun, interactive toy that stimulates creativity.
pros: Kids can style Trolls' hair with this unique Play-Doh salon set
Comes with two Trolls, salon accessories, and seven cans of Play-Doh
cons: Parents will occasionally have to clean Play-Doh from the Trolls' heads, but kids don't seem to mind

customer_reviews.title: My almost 3 yo daughter loves this Play-Doh set. ...
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 yo daughter loves this Play-Doh set. Only 4 stars because the Play-Doh gets stuck up in their heads and I have to get a butter knife to clean them out, which annoys me.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my troll loving 4 year old as her first play doh set. I really dreaded starting her on play doh because I’m lazy and hate to clean it all up from the table and floor multiple times a day but this was a good choice. It is simple enough where she can use it on her own. She was very excited about growing the hair and being able to cut with scissors. She has since moved on to more in-depth sets but this one lasted and kept her attention for close to a year. It is easy to clean and doesn’t have too many nooks and crannies where dry play doh gets stuck. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: Fun play doh toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids like the play doh toys that they can cut the hair on. This seemed perfect since they love trolls too. Overall the toy is fine and works. The princess poppy hair mold was frustrating for my youngest because you really need a bigger thing of Play-Doh to fill it. Also I don't like that the bottom of the feet have indentions where Play-Doh can get stuck. It's cool for the troll aspect, but I wish it was more like the normal hair growing molds.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It def looks like locs rather than troll hair but ok
customer_reviews.text: It def looks like locs rather than troll hair but ok. My kid didn’t buy it was their hair. I don’t blame her and it’s kinda pricey. Also the playdoh always gets stuck in the tube or troll’s body and it takes a bit of force to push the playdoh through the small hair follicles. So what that means is my kid requires me to do it for them. I only wanna pay around 12 bucks for a playdoh set that I don’t have to play with.
customer_reviews.author: OregonMom

customer_reviews.title: It’s impossible for my 5 and 3 year olds to ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s impossible for my 5 and 3 year olds to do this by themselves. It’s so hard, even for me, to manipulate the troll into and out of the flower and really hard to get the play doh through. My kids were excited about it but got frustrated and don’t want to play with it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Troll Hair
customer_reviews.text: This was such a big hit. My toddler has two loves. Play-Doh and Trolls. He absolutely LOVES this set. My four, six, eight, and eleven year olds take turns playing with him and his “troll hair”. It comes with 7 small containers of Play-Doh. You can use the hair mold to mold troll hair or use the chair to let the trolls grow hair. Use the scissors to give the trolls a hair cut. This has provided hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves this! However, it ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this! However, it is very difficult for her to play with independently because you have to press the troll body so hard to get the hair to come through and she can’t do it by herself. It’s also difficult to clean the playdoh out of the troll body when finished.
customer_reviews.author: CJB92812

customer_reviews.title: Cool Theme
customer_reviews.text: It's Play-Doh with a few Trolls themed accessories. Glad it wasn't overpriced given the theme, and it added a few colors that my daughter didn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: It's really fun to style their Play-Doh hair
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a birthday gift to a 4 year old and she loves it! She still plays with it months later. It's really fun to style their Play-Doh hair.
customer_reviews.author: Just a mom

customer_reviews.title: Great way to practice using scissors and fun for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Great way to practice using scissors and fun for my daughter to cut and style troll hair. A little hard to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Shopicorn

customer_reviews.title: Small children may not have the strength to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3.5 year old granddaughter who loves anything to do with Trolls. She's not strong enough to make the hair "grow" so it's up to grampa or grandma after which she has great fun cutting, styling and shaping.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInOhio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my kiddos for Christmas and they love it! Super easy to use and clean up. My girls are ages 4, 6 and 7. If using with multiple kids at once, I recommend once you make the hair for one, remove it from the stand so that another one can be made while the first is being styled.
customer_reviews.author: Jonescr2

customer_reviews.title: Love everything Play-Doh
customer_reviews.text: This Play-Doh set is so cute! My kids love it. I do have to help them push down the seat at times to make the hair grow but they love cutting it and making multi color hair. My children are boys and they love it. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina Richard

customer_reviews.title: Poppy and Branch
customer_reviews.text: This play-doh set is adorable! My granddaughter and I love to play with it. We pop in he troll movie and and let our imagination run wild! Her age is 3 1/2 mine 50 something. Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Giantonio

customer_reviews.title: She enjoys playing with it and we had fun playing with it together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-year-old granddaughter. She enjoys playing with it and we had fun playing with it together. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.text: and once again Play-Doh comes through. My granddaughter loves her Play-Doh and this Troll themed play set has kept her busy at play. Thanks!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice set

customer_reviews.text: My kids (age 2 and 4) love this. They sometimes have trouble pushing the trolls down hard enough that the play doh hair comes out. But this has given us many hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Fun but....
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old and 10 yr old nieces loved these, the only suggestions I'd make is to provide more accessories to make more designs and double up on the foam for a bigger pumpkin, otherwise they loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for parents sake
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old loves this and the minion playdoh set. Great for parents.

customer_reviews.title: Its decent but difficult
customer_reviews.text: Its playdoh of course it's fun for all ages The bad thing is it's almost impossible to get playdoh out of the holes where the "hair" goes and once it gets stuck and dries out in that then no more hair. I had to bang it on my table a lot to get the little tiny pieces of playdoh out Bad design when it comes to that..

customer_reviews.title: I have a gifted child!
customer_reviews.text: He ate every last bite of playdough. Lord help me.

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite gift! If you love play-doh this is a must!

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The pieces don't snap together for the hair part and you have to push really hard to get the characters to go down and the playdough hair to come out. My five year old had some fun but it wasn't as great as I would have hoped!

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Trolls Press N Style Salon Model Kit
product_meta.description: It's almost time for the next celebration at Troll Village, and Poppy and Branch need help getting ready! Grow colorful Play-Doh hair for these 2 heroes with their very own hair chair pod, which also comes with all the right accessories to give them custom styles again and again! Hasbro, Play-Doh and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro. DreamWorks Trolls Copyright 2016 DreamWorks Animation LLC. All Rights Reserved.
feature_bullets: Create colorful Play-Doh hairstyles for Dreamworks Trolls characters
Place a character in the chair and press to grow silly hair
Shape fun styles with the book-mold and accessories with the half-molds
Features Dreamworks Trolls Poppy and Dreamworks Trolls Branch from the movie
Includes 2 figures, unassembled chair, hair book-mold, scissors, and 7 cans of Play-Doh Brand Modeling Compound

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
